response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $15,000 by you. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $13,500. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your response soon. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 13500}
